title: About Me
text:
Hi, I’m Mario

Welcome to my project!
This dashboard is part of a personal learning exercise where I explore R, Quarto, reproducible workflows, and interactive data products.
It was inspired by Melissa Van Bussel’s 2024 Posit Table Contest submission, which served as a template and educational reference.
The current version includes a lightweight data pipeline that refreshes Spotify Hot 100 track data, manages cache files for weekly updates, and enriches chart tracks with audio features for analysis-ready outputs.
I’m currently building skills in data analysis and engineering—including SQL, Python, R, API work, and dashboard development. I enjoy creating small analytical tools and exploring real datasets, especially music, sports, and personal metrics.
If you’d like to connect, you can find me here:

GitHub: https://github.com/MariojReyes

LinkedIn: https://linkedin.com/in/marioreyesiii
